package.name: ImageCorrect.
package.shortDescription: Quick access to your pictures from anywhere.

descriptionlist.description: Have you ever participated in a conversation and had the perfect meme to send, but could never get it on time? With ImageCorrect, you can quickly access your most used images and memes by typing a given title anywhere you can place an image! Can't remember all your titles? Don't worry, ImageCorrect also offers a quick access menu to quickly search all of your titles, allowing you to access any picture in seconds without having to memorize them all! In addition to the shortcut menu, ImageCorrect also now has a collage menu accessible from the text selection menu. Using the collage menu, all your images are just a tap away! Getting to your images has never been easier.
